column3: Go to the "Applications/Update Requests" page in the Administration area
Select a new application that can be rejected (e.g. is in status Ready) and click "Review application"
Complete any required fields, and then change the Application Status to "Rejected"

column4: A flash message indicates that the application record was updated

column3: Go to the mailtrap.io inbox for the test environment you are working in

column4: Ensure that there is no email associated with the rejection
